Non-statistical indicator

We have identified the following to be relevant to this indicator - Rights of Women: Protecting women's rights

.

fr.graph_title: Whether or not legal frameworks are in place to promote, enforce and monitor equality and non‐discrimination on the basis of sex
fr.indicator_name: Whether or not legal frameworks are in place to promote, enforce and monitor equality and non‐discrimination on the basis of sex
fr.page_content:
Indicateur non statistique<\p>

Nous avons identifié les éléments suivants comme étant pertinents pour cet indicateur - Droits des femmes: Protéger les droits des femmes.

SDG_GOAL: Goal 5: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
SDG_TARGET: Target 5.1: End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 5.1.1: Whether or not legal frameworks are in place to promote, enforce and monitor equality and non‑discrimination on the basis of sex
STAT_CONC_DEF: Indicator 5.1.1 measures Government efforts to put in place legal frameworks that promote, enforce and monitor gender equality.
